meanings.definition: The action or process of instigating something.
meanings.sent1: Her instigations led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent2: The instigations of the project manager motivated the team.
meanings.sent3: His instigations to start a lemonade stand were unexpected but fun.
meanings.sent4: The instigations of change brought a wave of innovation.
meanings.sent5: The instigations of the teacher made the students eager to learn.

meanings.definition: The act of urging, provoking, or inciting someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: The instigations of the coach pushed the team to victory.
meanings.sent2: Her instigations to try a new hobby were met with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: His instigations to prank his friend backfired hilariously.
meanings.sent4: The instigations of the speaker ignited a passion for change.
meanings.sent5: The instigations of the children to play outside were met with joy.
